ocean.question: I swim in the sea and I'm orange. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I have fins and a tail
🏡 I live in the water
🧡 My color is like a carrot

ocean.question: I’m a big, blue home for many fish. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm made of water
🚢 Boats sail on me
🐳 Whales live in me

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am not a spider, but I have many arms
💦 I squirt ink when I'm scared
🪨 I hide in rocks

ocean.question: I’m hard and you can find me on the beach. Sometimes, you can hear the ocean in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I used to be someone's home
👂 Put me to your ear
⛱️ I'm often found near sandcastles

ocean.question: I'm very big and I swim in the ocean. I sing songs and have a blowhole. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal, not a fish
💧 I breathe air through a hole on my back
🎶 You might hear me singing underwater

ocean.question: I have a shell and I'm very slow. I like to eat lettuce. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I carry my house on my back
🥬 I love to eat green things
🚶 I am slower than a snail

ocean.question: I'm a colorful fish and I live in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I come in many different colors
🏠 I live in a coral city
🐠 Other small fish are my friends

ocean.question: I have a big mouth and sharp teeth. I swim in the ocean and some people are scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a type of fish.
🦷 I have lots of pointy teeth
🌊 You might see my fin above the water

ocean.question: I have a pointy nose and I jump out of the water. I'm very smart and playful. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I am a mammal that lives in the ocean.
😀 I am known for being friendly and intelligent
🌊 You can see me jumping and playing in the waves

ocean.question: I’m a place under the sea with many colors, fish, and plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 Many fish live in me.
🪴 Plants and animals make beautiful home.
🧱 I am built by tiny animals.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and like to drink milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🐈 I like to play with string.
🧶 I have soft fur.
🥛 People sometimes keep me as a pet inside.

animal.question: I go 'Woof, woof!' and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like to play fetch.
🏡 People keep me as a pet inside.

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat grass in a field.
⬛ I have black and white spots.
🥛 People drink what I make.

animal.question: I say 'Quack, quack!' and swim in the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🟠 I have webbed feet.
🦆 I like to swim in a pond.
🥚 I lay eggs.

animal.question: I hop around and love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I wiggle my nose.
🐇 I have long ears.
🌱 I like to eat vegetables.

animal.question: I am big and gray and have a long trunk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I live in Africa and Asia.
🚿 I use my long nose to drink and shower.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I have spots.
🌳 I am the tallest animal in the world.
🍃 I eat leaves from trees.

animal.question: I roar very loudly and am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a big mane.
🦁 I live in Africa.
🐾 I am a very powerful cat.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes all over my body. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look like a horse.
🌍 I live in Africa.
🦓 No two of my stripes are exactly the same.

animal.question: I climb trees and eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I like to swing from branches.
🌴 I live in the jungle.
🍌 I like yellow fruit that grows on trees
